 2003-06222003-05-02,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TB,  IA&ND, 
ActIndian Act
Indian Act
PrecisAuthority (a) to enter into the SIKSIKA ACREAGE DISCREPANCY (SURFACE) CLAIM SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT with the SIKSIKA NATION for the purpose of resolving a specific claim associated with the surrender in 1910 of part of Blackfoot Indian Reserve No. 146 in Alberta, and (b) to accept the absolute surrender of some 5 067.9 hectares (12,522.6 acres) of Siksika Indian Reserve No. 146, as set out in Article 5 of the Agreement.
AttachmentsAttachmentAttachment
precis: Authority (a) to enter into the SIKSIKA ACREAGE DISCREPANCY (SURFACE) CLAIM SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT with the SIKSIKA NATION for the purpose of resolving a specific claim associated with the surrender in 1910 of part of Blackfoot Indian Reserve No. 146 in Alberta, and (b) to accept the absolute surrender of some 5 067.9 hectares (12,522.6 acres) of Siksika Indian Reserve No. 146, as set out in Article 5 of the Agreement.
